name: Diner Empire
description:
This game involves building your restaurant empire by efficiently commanding your kitchen staff to produce high quality food which customers will enjoy. Along the way you will increase your restaurant's reputation and earn money to purchase more restaurants to add to your empire - also acquiring  more staff, increased customer seating and various cuisines from across the globe.

The game is currently free because it is still in development, however the price will be  $3.99 USD once the game is released.

The game is intended to be released in the summer of 2018 on Steam and here.
